title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Self-Directed Learning for Basic Competency in Medical Imaging Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and anatomy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify basic lesion locations in X-ray images with 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish diagnostic hypotheses by applying a three-stage reasoning process (non-analytical → analytical → verification).
Learners can list over five potential error sources in medical imaging interpretation and explain mitigation strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
